text_block_list.text: One day, while passing near the shopping district——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
There's a crowd of people, huh?
I wonder what's going on.

text_block_list.name: Shopping District Person
text_block_list.text:
Come on, come on, the New Year's Lucky Draw Festival is underway!
The grand prize is nothing less than a 'Hot Spring Travel Voucher'!

text_block_list.name: Shopping District Person
text_block_list.text:
First prize is 'Premium Carrot Hamburger Steak'
Second prize is 'Mountain of Carrots'
Third prize is 'One Carrot'!

text_block_list.name: Shopping District Person
text_block_list.text:
Come on, it's a fun, fun lucky draw!
Anyone is welcome~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Wow, a hot spring travel voucher~!
That sounds great.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I think I'll give it a shot!
Um, excuse me, I'd like to do one lucky draw!

text_block_list.name: Shopping District Person
text_block_list.text: Okay, here's one lucky draw ticket then!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, right. A lucky draw ticket...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, wait a moment, please,
I'll go do some shopping~!

After that, Matikanetannhauser hurriedly obtained a lucky draw ticket.
Once again, she pulled the lever of the lucky draw machine!
And the result was——

text_block_list.name: Shopping District Person
text_block_list.text:
Incredible! Congratulations!!
The grand prize 'Hot Spring Travel Voucher' has been drawn~~~~!!
Obtained '<itemname>'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whaaaaaat!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, whoa, I did it, I did it,
I actually did it, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wow, I'm so happy~!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hehe,
So, when should we go!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
It's a hot spring trip~. Things are a bit busy now, so
maybe after things calm down a bit, huh?

Now that you mention it, it's a pair ticket.
But still——
choice_data_list: Is it okay if I'm the pair?
Is it okay if I'm the pair?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? Yes.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Um, is it weird to invite the trainer...?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, I thought the partner for something like this would probably be the trainer.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: They're the person I rely on the most, like a partner, or, um...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...If you don't want to, that's fine.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ! Really!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wow, yay, yay! Then let's plan it out again properly!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I'm looking forward to it~. The trainer and a steamy hot spring mystery—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah! No, no, I just said a set phrase and my mouth ran away with it!
Anyway, I've got one more fun plan to look forward to!

text_block_list.name: Shopping District Person
text_block_list.text: Congratulations, first prize~! The prize is 'Premium Carrot Hamburger Steak'!
Acquired '<itemname>'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ooh~! First prize!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: We missed out on the hot spring trip, but this looks super delicious~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hey, since we have it, want to eat it together? Like for dinner tonight!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Of course~. Hey, since we're at it, I'll make some side dishes!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So... is it okay if I go to the supermarket for a bit?
And so, Matikanetannhauser prepared a delicious dinner!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: 'Premium Carrot Hamburger Steak' with side salad, corn soup, and—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Somen noodles!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Since the hamburg steak is pretty big and heavy, I think a smooth main dish would be good~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, I also chopped some green onions and shiso leaves. I'll bring them over.
In any case, the meal they prepared was also very delicious, and we had a fun dinner time.

text_block_list.name: Shopping District Person
text_block_list.text: Second prize~!! The prize is 'A Mountain of Carrots'!
Obtained '<itemname>'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Second prize, huh~! So close~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But I'm happy with this too. They all look shiny and delicious!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh right, since we have the chance, maybe I'll share some with everyone!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: At our family restaurant, neighbors often share vegetables with us, and I've always admired the idea of sharing back a little!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ma'am, sorry for the late hour~. We ended up harvesting a lot of carrots from our garden~.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Well, I'm happy. Thanks for going out of your way! Wait a moment, we have some potatoes too—

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: What are you doing!
That day, the student dormitory seemed a little livelier than usual.

text_block_list.name: Shopping District Person
text_block_list.text: Third prize~! The prize is 'One Carrot'!
Obtained '<itemname>'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Aww, third place! Too bad, too bad.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, that's just how raffles are, I guess.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Since we have it, I'd like to eat something delicious with this carrot.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Our restaurant's kinpira is really tasty. What was the recipe again?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll give them a call!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, hello?
After that, she made the kinpira gobo that was being served at her family's diner.

text_block_list.name: Shopping District Person
text_block_list.text: Too bad, you lost! The participation prize is 'tissue'~.
Obtained '<itemname>'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Aww~! Too bad!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Even if a hot spring trip is out of the question, I thought maybe at least one carrot...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, it's a tough world, isn't it?
After that, Matikanetannhauser lost a little bit of her energy.
